cast.name: 唐纳德·特朗普 Donald Trump
希拉里·罗德姆·克林顿 Hillary Rodham Clinton

this_title: The Circus: Inside the Greatest Political Show on Earth Season 2
trans_title: 马戏团：地球上最伟大的政治表演 第二季
introduction: Come one, come all to THE CIRCUS. This documentary series pulls back the curtain on the 2016 presidential race and the Trump administration, revealing the intense, inspiring and infuriating stories behind the headlines. Key characters and events are presented in real time, as they are happening. THE CIRCUS is a non-partisan, never-before-attempted take on one of the most fascinating and consequential political periods in modern American history.
chinese_title: 马戏团：地球上最伟大的政治表演 第二季
foreign_title: The Circus: Inside the Greatest Political Show on Earth Season 2
